title: Discord Bot List
description: A bot listing site built on Express with Pug rendering engine. Supports Discord OAuth. Bots are stored in a MongoDB server. Admins use a Discord bot to manage and verify bots along with some web interfaces.

title: Periodic Table
description: A frontend-only site that generates an A-Level periodic table from a JSON file with detailed information each element.

title: Nickel
description: An ElectronJS app to encode, decode and auto solve ciphers. Analyse properties of the text to identify the cipher or solve manually.

title: Monopoly
description: A Python program to simulate Monopoly games in the command line to try to reach an ideal game by analysing results.

title: Reddit Bots
description: An automatically generated, ever expanding collection of bots on Reddit. Uses a points-based algorithm to determine whether a user is a bot. Built on Nuxt with a Typescript Express server.

title: Journal App
description: A self-hosted PWA for journaling using the Phoenix frameowrk.

title: Cellular Automaton
description: A 3D cellular automaton game based on Conway's game of life

title: Dijkstra's Algorithm
description: A web animation to visualise Dijkstra's algorithm in 3D. Simulates a graph by having a radius around each point that connect them to other points.
